key_feature_steps.description: Fabric content including linings & any trims 5% or more or makeup.
Machine washable, Hand wash, Dry clean, Spot clean, Wipe clean, etc. Professionally leather or suede clean.
Imported, Made in USA, Made in USA of imported materials, Made in USA and imported, etc.
Model is 0.0" and is wearing a size X.
Fitted, oversized, relaxed, loose, etc.; weight (if applicable).
Silhouette: mini, midi, maxi, etc.; 00' long from center back neck for size X.
Pullover style, Button front placket, Back button with keyhole, etc.
Short, long, blouse, illusion, elbow-length, 3/4 sleeves, etc.
How many and location or use: None.
Trims, special hems, decorative details, unlined or lined, etc.

summary: The page outlines key feature directions for women's dresses, bodysuits, and one-pieces, detailing essential attributes such as material, care, country of origin, size, fit, length, closure, sleeves, pockets, and features.
